item.title: ITT: smacktard speaks truth
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

speljohan_ slaps stork around a bit with a large penis

smacktard, religion
tl why would you ask that?

  • tL slaps smacktard around a bit with a large trout
    i got a bit with a large trout

he also confirmed that castro fathered a 6-year-old girl who berry gave birth to in physics isa bnl

You may remember when I made dicklord chat with cleverbot…

This is just as epic:

Smacktard: Imagine if the n64 used my power transistors so it just got really loveing hot.

Cleverbot: What in the world are you talking about?

Smacktard: What you meant.

Cleverbot: Meant.

Smacktard: And basically that is what I meant to say I think.

Cleverbot: Basically what I mean is that the purpose of your life is embedded within a mist of the unknown.

Smacktard: That argument swings both ways I smile and look at the floor.

Cleverbot: Yes!

Smacktard: But yes smacktard, dicklord chat about shit scripters?

Cleverbot: The name.

Smacktard: I need, I will become the display but the rest of it is just tought one of the its people how to do it with your hands.

Cleverbot: Will you still need me, will you still feed me, when I'm 64?

Smacktard: I was still a thing btw.

Cleverbot: How old are you now?

Smacktard: How old chink pedo donors.

Cleverbot: One or two years.

Smacktard: I dont want to spend over nine thousand years.

Cleverbot: What are your hobbies?

Smacktard: Did you want even more help in controlling your penis.

Cleverbot: Yes.
